entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 8 this morning then rising.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
